articles.title: Patriots stock watch: Here’s who stood out and struggled in Super Bowl loss to Seahawks
articles.description:
Christian Gonzalez and Craig Woodson had strong showings in the Super Bowl. Will Campbell and the Patriots' offensive line? Not so much.

The post Patriots stock watch: Here’s who stood out and struggled in Super Bowl loss to Seahawks appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Christian Gonzalez and Craig Woodson excelled in the Super Bowl against the Seahawks.
Will Campbell and the offensive line struggled, impacting the Patriots' performance.
The loss raises concerns for Boston fans about the team's future prospects.

articles.title: What an emotional Drake Maye said of Super Bowl LX loss
articles.description:
“If you make them, you're celebrating. If you [don't], you're sitting here crying at a podium."

The post What an emotional Drake Maye said of Super Bowl LX loss appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Drake Maye expressed deep emotion after the New England Patriots' Super Bowl LX loss.
The Patriots lost to the Seattle Seahawks, impacting local fans' morale.
Maye's comments highlight the emotional stakes for Boston sports enthusiasts.
